snippet: Deron Williams scored 26 points to help the Nets beat the Detroit Pistons, 99-96, on Wednesday night in Newark.
abstract: NBA Roundup; New Jersey Nets defeat Detroit Pistons, 99-96; other NBA scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams scored 26 points to help the Nets beat the Detroit Pistons, 99-96, on Wednesday night in Newark.

headline.seo: Deron Williams Leads Nets Over Pistons With 26 Points
headline.main: Nets Hold Off the Pistons Behind Williams’s 26 Points
headline.print_headline: Nets Hold Off the Pistons Behind Williams’s 26 Points
